did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: The cave and the mountain: a study of E. M. Forster,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] The cave and the mountain: a study of E. M. Forster, M0156, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Author and professor of English at Stanford University (1963- ). Area of research includes nineteenth century and modern English literature; novel, and poetry.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Summary: First draft, revised first draft, and second draft of Dr. Stone's manuscript, The Cave and the Mountain ... Includes manuscript corrections, editing of the second draft, the editor's copy of the manuscript and the galleys.

did.unittitle: First Draft -typed with manuscript corrections. Two versions of Chapter 13 , neither final.
Revised First Draft - typed with manuscript corrections
Editor's Copy - "This is the manuscript as cut up by the editors at the Press from which the book was finally printed."
